title: Hezekiahâ€™s Religious Reforms
summary: After the Passover, Hezekiah leads the people to destroy idols and pagan altars across Judah. He reorganizes the priests and Levites, establishes tithing systems, and ensures temple worship continues properly.

faq.question: What actions did Hezekiah take after the Passover?
faq.answer: He removed idols and reinstituted tithes and temple worship.

faq.question: How did the people respond?
faq.answer: They gave generously, and temple services were restored with joy.
